Name: James Ravenscroft
AboutMe:
I am a Solutions Architect within the Watson Ecosystem at IBM. I am based in Hursley, United Kingdom some days and London the rest. I am also a part time PhD student in the field of Natural Language processing at the University of Warwick, UK.

I have had experience working with a variety of programming languages including (but not restricted to): Python, PHP, Java, C/C++, Perl, Haskell and Javascript. I have a fair amount of knowledge about Machine Learning systems and Linguistic Computing.

When I'm not at work, I like to be learning new things, reading books, playing my saxophone and guitar and going on walks. I also do the lindyhop - a 1920s style jazz/swing dance.
